This nigger's breaking up my place, Sheriff Langston.
I don't like that word much, Carter.
We don't serve them here and you know it.
I asked him to leave and he went crazy on us!
- Now he owes me money for this damage. - Is that a fact?
Afraid not, Sheriff. These other fellas started the ruckus.
I wanted a drink and a bed.
- Guess I came to the wrong place. - Came to the wrong town.
I don't tolerate this. It's hard on the peace and the furniture.
Knowing a bit about Carter, I'll let you go without paying for the damage.
Is there a place in town that takes my kind?
You misunderstand. I want you out of town.
In fact, I want you all the way out of my jurisdiction.
I decide what's right in this jurisdiction. Now move.
